description:
given connect_ec2_endpoint from https://github.com/smoser/boto/commit/3646305abbe8aa1f020c00d1bbc38baf382eb7c0

  url="http://127.0.0.1:8773/services/Cloud"
  conn=connect_ec2_endpoint(url)
  imgs=conn.get_all_images()
  print imgs[0].location

shows something like:
   None (ttylinux-uec-amd64-11.2_2.6.35-15_1-kernel)

Or, more simply:
$ euca-describe-images ami-00000002
IMAGE   ami-00000002    None (ttylinux-uec-amd64-11.2_2.6.35-15_1)              available       public                  machine aki-00000001            instance-store

Note, these images were uploaded via glance (in devstack setup), so that is possibly part of the issue.  The ec2-api mechanism for puloading is broken (bug 903345) if using keystone.
title: ec2 api returns bad location field for DescribeImages

comments.content:
given connect_ec2_endpoint from https://github.com/smoser/boto/commit/3646305abbe8aa1f020c00d1bbc38baf382eb7c0

  conn=connect_ec2_endpoint(url)
  imgs=conn.get_all_images()
  print imgs[0].location

shows something like:
   None (ttylinux-uec-amd64-11.2_2.6.35-15_1-kernel)

Or, more simply:
$ euca-describe-images ami-00000002
IMAGE   ami-00000002    None (ttylinux-uec-amd64-11.2_2.6.35-15_1)              available       public                  machine aki-00000001            instance-store


Note, these images were uploaded via glance (in devstack setup), so that is possibly part of the issue.  The ec2-api mechanism for puloading is broken (bug 903345) if using keystone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~smoser

comments.content:
Using euca2ools you can upload an image with a location,  and bug 903345 is Fixed.


vagrant@precise:~/devstack$ euca-describe-images 
IMAGE   ami-00000004    mybucket/ubuntu-12.04-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.img.manifest.xml      ad587b86a3bb473584ed6122f3875e8b        uploading       private         x86_64  machine                         instance-store
IMAGE   ami-00000001    None (cirros-0.3.0-x86_64-uec)  ad587b86a3bb473584ed6122f3875e8b        available       public                  machine aki-00000002    ari-00000003            instance-store
IMAGE   ari-00000003    None (cirros-0.3.0-x86_64-uec-ramdisk)  ad587b86a3bb473584ed6122f3875e8b        available       public                  ramdisk                         instance-store
IMAGE   aki-00000002    None (cirros-0.3.0-x86_64-uec-kernel)   ad587b86a3bb473584ed6122f3875e8b        available       public                  kernel                          instance-store
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo
